_comment: Template for Slack message to be sent by the plugin.

text.text:
*Summary:*
Here's a summary of the top AI news stories from this week, gathered through web search.

*Headline:* OpenAI Announces New Model, GPT-5
*Source:* <https://www.example.com/openai-gpt5|Example News Site>
*Key Findings:* GPT-5 boasts significant improvements in reasoning and code generation. Early access available for select partners.

*Headline:* Google's DeepMind Achieves Breakthrough in Protein Folding
*Source:* <https://www.example.com/deepmind-protein|DeepMind Blog>
*Key Findings:* AlphaFold 3 demonstrates increased accuracy and coverage in predicting protein structures.

*Headline:* AI Ethics Concerns Raised by New Facial Recognition Technology
*Source:* <https://www.example.com/facial-recognition-ethics|TechCrunch>
*Key Findings:* Experts warn about potential biases and privacy violations associated with the latest facial recognition systems.

elements.text: Report generated by Claude using `web_search` and `search_to_slack` plugin.
